title: I'm almost certain that Riot is prioritising Queue Times over Game Quality right now.
body:
I got Low Priority Queue for Disconnecting from games so that they could be remade on the basis of poor matchmaking quality. For the last month or so every Normal game I've joined has been Me (Gold) + 4 Silver/Bronze/Unranked vs. 5 Gold+.

My games are literally over before they begin. My team is generally a bunch of off-meta garbage being played by low elo vs. a team full of competent players who are likely practising for ranked.

**This part is addressed directly to Riot: I would much rather sit in queue for 5 minutes and get an even game, than get a 30 second queue time and have to spend the next 5-15 minutes waiting for the game to end (assuming they don't hold the game hostage).**

replies.body: legit critique and raising concern about a real issue but gets down voted just because it's "saying something negative about riot or the game".

if your playing flex that happens but whats worse is today i played a level 30 match and i had a support no keystone trynd supprot thought ok maybe wrong masterys or something after i look at his profile not level 20 or 25 but level 13!!

Right now, unless I'm playing SoloQ, I can't get a competitive game. Blind Pick/ARAM/TT/FlexQ are all abysmal right now. I'm either on the loaded team, or the receiving end of bad matchmaking. Either way, games aren't at all satisfying.

Imagine being matched with different ranks in a normal match üò≤

You do know ranked mmr has nothing to do with normal mmr right üëç
